title: Ice
description: Fictionpress/The ChamberIce knows all about rules, perfection and claustrophobia. Daughter of the wealthiest african-american banker in town, she knows that image is everything. Enter Peyton Stone, a sexy troublemaker who seems to live above the rules. He can get whatever girl he wants, but when he takes interest in Ice, what's a simple reserved girl to do? Two worlds collide on love, lies, lust, betrayal and forgiveness.Young Adult, Drama, Romance 17 and older (Adult Situations, Extreme Language, Sexual Content)
author: penny88
